title.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. I, Owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 North Broadway, Chicago, Illinois. 1918 Proletariat of the World, Unite!! Long Live the Social Revolution!! Great Proletarian Holiday in Honor of the German Revolution and the Russian Socialist Republic

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbook, Vol. I, Owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 North Broadway, Chicago, Illinois. PROLETARIAT OF THE WORLD, UNITE!! LONG LIVE THE SOCIAL REVOLUTION!! GREAT PROLETARIAN HOLIDAY IN HONOR OF THE GERMAN REVOLUTION AND THE RUSSIAN SOCIALIST REPUBLIC

body.p: Arranged by the National Central Committee of the American Socialist Party. Will take place Sunday, Nov. 17, 1918, at 2:30 P. M. in the Chicago Coliseum, Wabash Avenue and 15th Street.
The speakers are: Seymour Stedman, Alexander Stoklitzky, Erwin John Toker, Victor L. Berger, C. A. Lopnagel, A. Dreifus, John Lewish Engdall, Adolph Heimer, and others.
Come in masses. Admission is 10 cents.
